question: 8th September 2017 is celebrated as _________ International Literacy Day.
explanation: On 8th September 2017, 51st International Literacy Day was celebrated at Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi. The theme was 'Literacy in a digital world'. International Literacy Day is celebrated in India every year since 1988. On this day, public awareness is created to eradicate illiteracy and spread the importance of adult education programs.
